title: Ball of Yarn
description:
A ball of yarn, as used to knit a scarf. Color varies across platforms, but often depicted in green, blue, or magenta and shown with an end unraveling. Sometimes depicted with a pair of knitting needles stuck in the ball.

Commonly used for various content concerning knitting and needlework (e.g., sewing, crocheting), clothing and fashion, arts and crafts, cold weather, and cats.
apple_vendor_description: The yarn emoji on Apple devices appears as a soft, coiled ball of colorful thread, often depicted with a slightly fuzzy texture and a gentle sheen. Apple's design emphasizes realistic lighting and smooth gradients, giving the yarn a tactile quality and a pleasingly rounded form. This emoji is commonly used to represent knitting, crafting, hobbies, or anything related to textiles and cozy activities.
